cards.name: The Guy in the 4000$ Suit
cards.description: Gain +4 Recognition per turn, Gain +10 Confidence, Lose -15 Social Skills.
cards.flavourText: Why don’t I just take a whiz through this 5000 dollar suit? COME ON!

cards.name: Stress Seminar
cards.description: Stress, if higher -10 Recognition, if lower +10 Recognition. +10 Stress.
cards.flavourText: Anyone still experiencing stress by the end of the day will be FIRED!

cards.name: Phone A Friend
cards.description: If Intelligence > 120, gain +10 Recognition, +5 Stress, +10 Confidence . +10 Social Skills If Intelligence < 120 lose -10 Recognition, -10 Confidence, -10 Social Skills, Gain +15 Stress.
cards.flavourText: Anyone still experiencing stress by the end of the day will be FIRED!

cards.name: Trapped by a Spider
cards.description: Lose -5 Recognition per turn, -5 Confidence, Gain +20 Stress.
cards.flavourText: The Spider has managed to walk behind me, and it’s between me and the door. So I can’t get out

cards.name: Loud Typing
cards.description: Lose -2 Recognition per turn, Lose -5 Social Skills, Gain 10+ Stress, +5 Work Ethic.
cards.flavourText: Can you stop!

cards.name: Neuralyzer
cards.description: Send Either all of the cards on your side of the field to the graveyard, or send all of the cards on your opponent’s side of the field to the graveyard.
cards.flavourText: Wait a minute. You just flash that thing, it erases her memory, and you just make up a new one?

cards.name: Called in to Work
cards.description: Gain +5 Recognition per turn, Gain +15 Work Ethic, +10 Stress, lose -5 Social Skill.
cards.flavourText: I’m not even supposed to be here today…

cards.name: Smoke Break
cards.description: Removes -50 Stress
cards.flavourText: Jaysus I need a rollie

cards.name: The Red Door
cards.description: Lose -4 Recognition per turn,  Lose -5 Work Ethic, Gain +10 Creativity.
cards.flavourText: What could possibly be behind that damn door, I haven’t slept, I’m up all night thinking about it…

cards.name: Turned Goth
cards.description: Play a card from the graveyard.
cards.flavourText: I just found this fresh new band, it’s called Bauhaus.

cards.name: New Boss
cards.description: Removes all Standard cards from the board, they are sent directly to the Graveyard.
cards.flavourText: 26? And you’re my new boss?

cards.name: Dating the Manager’s Daughter
cards.description: If Confidence > 140, lose -40 Stress. Gain +10 Social Skills. If Confidence < 120 lose -10 Recognition, -15 Confidence, -15 Social Skills, Gain +30 Stress.
cards.flavourText: I can explain… oh wait no I can’t.

cards.name: Business VS Card
cards.description: If Confidence + Social Skills player > opponent, lose -40 Stress. Gain +10 Social Skills. If Confidence + Social Skills < less than opponent lose -10 Recognition, -20 Confidence, -20 Social Skills, Gain +30 Stress.
cards.flavourText: Look at that subtle off-white coloring. The tasteful thickness of it. Oh, my God. It even has a watermark.

cards.name: Act Annoyed
cards.description: +3 Recognition for two turns, +20 stress +20 confidence,-10 social skills
cards.flavourText: Yeah, when you look annoyed all the time, people think that you're busy.

cards.name: Duvet Day
cards.description: -5 Recognition -40 stress +20 confidence, +10 creativty, +10 social skills
cards.flavourText: BEEP.BEEP.BEEP.BEEP

cards.name: Forget-Me-Know
cards.description: Last card played effects reversed: -20 stress, -10 social skills, 10 confidence
cards.flavourText: Sssshhhh. Shhhhh. There now, its ok go to sleep

cards.name: Voodoo DOLL
cards.description: -3 Recognition, -all base skills -5, + 5 stress
cards.flavourText: I can feel something hanging over me, like some dark force that makes me want to not recycle

cards.name: Accidental Nazi
cards.description: -5 Recognition, -10 social skills, +10 confidence, +10 work ethic +10 stress
cards.flavourText: I hear you’re a racist now

cards.name: Pan Pipe Dreams
cards.description: -50 stress, -15 work ethic, -10 social skills
cards.flavourText: The soothing sounds of the Andes-but in the office

cards.name: Elephant in the room
cards.description: -3 Recognition for 2 turns,  +10 stress
cards.flavourText: You didn’t get the memo on bring your pet to work

cards.name: Waste Disposal
cards.description: -3 Recognition, -10 social skills, -10 confidence
cards.flavourText: Disregard of the companies green policies is a sackable offence

cards.name: Defamation email got caught.
cards.description: Lose -20 Recognition, Gain +20 Stress, Lose -20 Social Skills
cards.flavourText: Why did I send that e-mail!

cards.name: Didn’t save your work
cards.description: Gain -5 Recognition, Gain -10 Confidence, Gain +20 Stress
cards.flavourText: Bollocks, I did that again! My whole day is lost!!!!

cards.name: Caught watching inappropriate content.
cards.description: Lose -25 Recognition, Lose -10 Social Skills, Gain +20 Stress.
cards.flavourText: Oh man, I knew it would happen someday!

cards.name: Hey boss, lunch is on me today!
cards.description: Gain +15 Recognition, Gain +10 Social Skills, Lose -10 Stress.
cards.flavourText: Better avail that the boss is in a good mood today

cards.name: All emails are answered!
cards.description: Gain +15 Recognition, Gain  +10 Social Skills, Gain +10 Stress.
cards.flavourText: Well done! You answered all your emails and are on top of your job!

cards.name: Sick Leave
cards.description: -30 Stress
cards.flavourText: I don’t know if I laugh or cry, but it’s good to be away from the job for a while…!
